668490.name: VR conference
668490.description:
DISTRIBUTE A ROOM NAME
When your participants enter the same room name, they join the VR conference. Never been easier. No matter if they join on their iOS, Android or PC with Vive or Oculus.

DRAW IS MORE THAN 1000 WORDS
Draw like you never can in video calls. Walk up to the whiteboard and get to understand each other. Draw together.

DRAW IN 3D TOGETHER

SHARE YOUR REAL LIFE
When you want to share something that can be viewed from your camera - you just do it. It opens up a large TV for all the other participants, right in front of them, so they can see your world.

MEET YOUR VIRTUAL YOU
Go to a partner and get your 3D scan. Then it is available in the VR conference so your friends can see it is you - like never before.

PRESENT ANYTHING VISIBLE IN A BROWSER
Agenda, Powerpoint, Maps, Google documents, Excel, Trello, Jira. Almost any modern tool, document or presentation can be viewed through a browser. Hint: copy the url of the presentation before - then 1-click present.

SHARE YOUR ENVIRONMENT
Take an 360 image with your mobile or e.g. Ricoh Theta, and bring your meeting with 1-click to a completely new environment and keep communicating. No matter if it is another conference room, a new car model or a beach.

SHARE 3D MODELS
Upload your 3D models of for example apartments, 3d CAD, city models and discuss them in a new way.

Supports Vive, Oculus, iOS and Android.
668490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
